content:
USMC Div Hqtrs 1st MARDIV, CAMPEN (RUC 11001) refers to the United States Marine Corps Division Headquarters for the 1st Marine Division, which is located at Camp Pendleton in California, USA.

Camp Pendleton is a major Marine Corps base that covers more than 125,000 acres of land and is located in northern San Diego County, California. The base is home to a variety of military units, including the 1st Marine Division, which is one of the oldest and most decorated divisions in the Marine Corps. The Division Headquarters provides command and control for the various units that make up the 1st Marine Division.
